attributes.title: Hinduism -- Path of celebration
attributes.description:
In today's morning Satsang, Paramahamsa Nithyananda explains how Hindus can use the 4 Tattvas to align themselves to Hinduism. Hinduism integrates us with ourselves expressing that we are the Cosmos. We are not slaves, sinners, or followers but the favorite inheritors of the Cosmos! We can use authenticity to build our self-image, aligning to this truth. It is our responsibility to enrich the world with Hinduism by expressing the atmosphere of peace, love, celebration, bliss, and the ability to coexist with all religions.

TRANSCRIPTIONS:-
I welcome all of you with my love and respects. Cities sitting with us in two-way video-conferencing: Los Angeles-Arunachalam.  Los Angeles, I welcome all of you with my love and blessings. Today, Nithyananda Vedic Temple and Nithyananda Vedic University in Los Angeles is celebrating the Hinduism Awareness Month. Actually, California Government has declared this month as Hinduism Awareness Month. So, Los Angeles Nithyananda Vedic Temple and Nithyananda Vedic University jointly distributed free Bhagawad Gita books, and is continuing to do this service, especially this month, and today they have a Hindu Open House celebration. I welcome all of you for the Hindu Open House celebration.  And I also welcome all the special guests.

Before I mention about all the special guests in Los Angeles, first I want to welcome the special guest have in Bidadi, Swamiji Sri Sri Sri Jnana Prakasha Desika Paramacharya Swami from Tondaimandalam Adheenam. Swamiji is here today again gracing our satsangh. I welcome Swamiji first for gracing this occasion.  As you all may be aware, Tondaimandalam Adheenam is one of the oldest Adheenams.  Swamiji is the 232nd Guru Maha Sannidhanam of the Adheenam.  This Adheenam is older than the Shankara Mutt established  in Kanchipuram. I welcome Swamiji here. First I welcome Swamiji then nowI move on to Los Angeles to welcome all the special guest.

First, Mr. Avdesh Aggarwal and Uma Aggarwal. Thank you for coming. Thank you for being here. I welcome both of you.  And I also wanted to remember, taking this moment, now the Los Angeles Temple is still running because of the big support by Avdesh Aggarwal. See, many devotees stood by us. I can name every devotee who is there now: Pankaj, every name I can name; and Abhinav. I cannot miss a single name but Avdesh stood with us in a very big way. People do not know the way he stood with us. Especially during the moments of crisis when some of the anti-Hindu forces, anti-spiritual elements were trying to shut down the temple, Avdesh Aggarwal stood with us, and he should be really honored today, and I wanted to remember his contribution to keep this temple alive and I wanted to sincerely thank on behalf of me and the whole Nithyananda Sangha

And I also welcome Mr. Amit Pathak who is an environmental engineer bank profession and also works with the American Hindu Foundation. Thank you for being here. I really thank  and give my respects for you being here. And I bless all the devotees who are there for the event.  Thank you for being there to celebrate the Hindu Awareness month

And Los Angeles temple has taken the responsibility of distributing 5,000 Bhagavad Gita books as the first step today. And I already requested the Los Angeles Nithyananda Vedic Temple and Nithyananda University to take up the project of distributing 1 million Bhagavad Gita books.  So, today, as the first step, they are starting with 5,000 Bhagavad Gita books.  And I would also like to request the Los Angeles Sannyasis, Peethadeeshwars please  give the first book to Avdesh Aggarwal ji  on behalf of me now. The first book  Thank you Avdesh ji!  Thank you!  Thank you!  Thank you Uma!  Thank you! And the next book to Mr. Amit Pathak.  Thank you!  And...Thank you!  Thank you Amit ji

I really wanted this distributing the books, Bhagavad Gita freely all over the world to happen.  Today we inaugurated the festival by distributing the first books to Avdesh ji and Amit Pathak ji. Thank you! Thank you for being here and I also request the Los Angeles Peethadeeshwars, please distribute the Bhagavad Gita books to all the devotees who have come here,gathered, and all the devotees, all the visitors should receive the Bhagavad Gita books. And today, as the inauguration ceremony, even in Bidadi, all the devotees, visitors will receive the Bhagavad Gita books. It's beautiful

And I also wanted to tell the Enriching Temple, today whoever calls you, send them free Bhagavad Gita book. Ship them free Bhagavad Gita book. Enriching Temple, whoever makes a call, please send them free Bhagavad Gita book. I request all the visitors, viewers through all the TV channels now who are watching this satsangh live, please send a missed call. Please send a miss call to the number on your screen and you will receive  free Bhagavad Gita book.

And I also wanted to sincerely remember all the contributions of each and every devotee who is sitting now in the Los Angeles temple
